LAUNCHWIN_DESC.POWER: The Vinci have the power of *Industry*
LAUNCHWIN_DESC.NATIONAL_SPELL: National Spell: "Industrial Devastation" creates an area that damages enemy units.
LAUNCHWIN_DESC.UNIQUE_TECH: Unique technology: "Scavenging" grants a resource rebate when Vinci units die.
LAUNCHWIN_DESC.START: Start: with one trip to the Inventor's Workshop

SPECIAL_ABILITIES.TEXT: Can build the Laboratory, which can be upgraded into 8 different unique buildings.

NOTABLE_UNITS.SUPPLY: Supply: Cargo Dirigible (created at the Aerodrome).
NOTABLE_UNITS.SIEGE: Siege: Steam Cannon (created at the Steam Fortress)
NOTABLE_UNITS.MASTER: Master Unit: Land Leviathan (created at the Steam Fortress)
